text: The Shah of Iran knew that holy Nasrudin was traveling through the country. He sent his scouts to locate him and bring him to live in the splendor of the court. After several months, the shah visited Nasrudin's luxurious rooms in the palace. Tell me, O holy and venerable, what words have you heard from the lips of Allah? Only the last ones will be of interest to you, Your Highness. God just whispered something in my ear. What did he say? He just told me to be careful what I say so I can stay in the Paradise he has found for me. FIN
title: De los labios de Alá
author: nan Anónimo
